articles.author: Winnie Hsu
articles.title: Plunge in Asia’s AI Shares Sows Doubts Over World-Beating Rally - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The sudden slump in Asia’s technology shares last week has jolted investors, serving as a stark reminder that the world-beating rally in artificial intelligence and semiconductor stocks may be nearing a short-term crest.
